title: Our neighborhood now sports red and blue plastic pads embedded in the sidewalks at the street corners. We understand this is supposed to be an aid for anyone who is sight impaired. Just wondering how much this project cost in Wilmintgon and who paid for it.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20100306/ARTICLES/100229712?p=all&tc=pgall
